step.cmd: Update paper type and scores. Save it. Then only move to comments.
Ensure that the steps are followed in chronological order, as failing to do so may prevent the feedback from being sent to the student.

cmd.b: Important: Ticket has to be closed before the email snip (No pdf one) is sent to the student.

step.cmd: Always save the scores, recheck twice before moving on to adding the comments.
Always TYPE in the # and the category names. Do NOT copy paste them.
Make sure the comments do not have any hyperlinks created in them randomly. Always paste from MS Word using paste as plain text feature. Just right click and tap on paste as plain text.
Do not change the spelling of category names. Do not input spellings like Grammar_and_Spellings its only Grammar_and_Spelling.
Do not forget the underscores in between the category names with spaces - Grammar_and_Spelling. Underscores are mandatory.
If more than one special request (E.g. Grammar and APA snip) then there is no need to write two #Please_Note comments. You can input both/all the special requests in one #Please_Note section.
Paper type for Not an essay and Not in English will remain as None

For a neat feedback presentation: If you are first typing the feedback in Microsoft Word and then copying it in the portal for in-app feedback, you may use Paste Special (Ctrl+Shift+V) while commenting to maintain a consistency in the font type and size. This will make the feedback look symmetric and clean.

result.note: YOU MUST TYPE THE #Headings ON THE PORTAL DIRECTLY. YOU MUST NOT COPY-PASTE THESE.
